Title: WPF Fee Calculation
Description: WPF reactive user experience, WCF server
HomeWiki:
Responsive Wpf user Experience sample
WPF reactive user experience, WCF server


This is a sample program to give a more responsive user experience. It has been cut down just to show the concepts.

Data is received from the WCF server for three items
1) portfolios are only updated once at the opening of the calculation view.
2) price cut off are populated on button press
3) the spreadsheet data is triggered to get the data and a button is enabled once the data has arrived.

This also shows how to use the MVVM pattern for a non WPF component.

This uses the concept introduced in http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dd419663.aspx
